MetricDescription: % critical data files and operations with an established backup frequency
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % Systems that have a contingency plan
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%. Good idea to insist on contingency plans for at least the critical systems
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems

MetricDescription: % systems for which contingency plans have been tested in the past year
Target:
X % or higher, 
X % higher than previous period, 
X % increase over a defined period 

Higher is better, ideally 100%. Good idea to insist on contingency plan testing for at least the critical systems
Source: NIST (Archived): SP 800-55, Security Metrics Guide for Information Technology Systems
